price: 21. Mpe molimo nyoso mokoyaka na mokambi naye mpe na nzeneneke.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
